  Login Person    Thursday 21 October 2021 19:52Upvote Upvote users say they were left petrified after a woman posted one of the most “convincing”  videos they’ve ever encountered.

The woman was rewatching home security footage of her dogs when she believed she spotted a “ghost” intervention. Sharing the clip, she urged people to pay close attention to her black dog.

“Sorry for the obnoxious barking at the beginning. Watch my black dog. [A] ghost takes her collar off in her crate,” she wrote in the video’s caption.

In the video, you see the two dogs, who are in separate crates barking at each other in what appears to be a living room.Recommended

Both dogs bark profusely until around the 23-second mark in the video when the pups ceased all noise, standing alert for a moment.

The black dog, who is in the crate to the right begins to whimper and then suddenly jumps back into a corner of the crate, seemingly trying to avoid something once its collar randomly pops off.

 to our new free Indy100 weekly newsletter

It was at this moment that the owner was certain that a ‘ghost’ was responsible—and others agreed.

Since the video was posted, it accrued over 1.3 million views at the time of writing and over 43,600 comments from people who think it’s a ghost as well.

“They both got super quiet...they felt the energy,” someone wrote.

“I’ve never seen such a convincing ghost video,” another added while a third noted that a seeming entity messing with dogs “doesn’t sit right” with them.

On the other hand, others believed there were logical explanations as to why the collar magically came off, with some saying that it was “stiff fabric” that caused the collar to unclasp or it simply “came off by accident and the dog got scared.”

No matter what transpired, it’s safe to say that the case of the fallen collar appeared to be creepy nonetheless.More About:
